dublin_core.dcvalue: A system for remote monitoring of patients vital signs using multipoint videoconferencing is proposed A multiparametric module and a videoconference server were developed to set up a proof of concept where a text was streamed live as data was captured while a third party monitored it
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
Vital signs remote monitoring through multipoint videoconferencing.
